name: Programming languages
description: Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Golang, Java, C#, Rust (preliminary)
tooltip: I used Eclipse and several J2EE MVC web frameworks (Struts, JavaServer Faces, Spring) in my first job but I no longer consider them as my work skills. I also learned Quick Basic and Visual Basic in and before high school.

name: Embedded programming languages
tooltip: Have contributed some open sourced hardware drivers to <kbd>pxt-microbit</kbd> (TypeScript), <kbd>TinyGo Drivers</kbd> and <kbd>MicroPython</kbd>.

name: Front-end and CSS frameworks
description: React.js, Vue.js, Svelte & SvelteKit, Docusaurus, Bootstrap

name: Machine learning packages
description: Scikit-learn, Tensorflow/Tensorflow Lite/Tensorflow.js, several AutoML packages

name: Development tools/cloud and container
description: VS Code, Node.js, pip, Docker/DevContainer/CodeSpace, Kubernetes (minikube/Kind/Docker Desktop)
